text: LeRoy Neiman (born Leroy Leslie Runquist, June 8, 1921 â€“ June 20, 2012) was an American artist. He is known for his colored, expressionist paintings and screen prints of athletes, musicians, and sporting events. He was born in St. Paul, Minnesota. Neiman died in New York City, New York from natural causes, aged 91. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1921 births Category:2012 deaths Category:American artists Category:People from Saint Paul, Minnesota
title: LeRoy Neiman
